t: Amazon cements its status as the world’s most valuable brand
s: June 30, 2020 - According to Kantar’s new global BrandZ ranking, which covers the 12 months to 7 April, Amazon remains in front of Apple for the second year running, despite the tech giant enjoying a 14% increase in value from 2019, up to $352bn.
